text: Sir Konstantin Sergeevich Novoselov (; born 1974) is a Russian-British physicist. He is a Professor at the Centre for Advanced 2D Materials, National University of Singapore. His work on graphene with Andre Geim won them the Nobel Prize in Physics in 2010. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2015. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Russian physicists Category:British physicists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Konstantin Novoselov
